thread.title: Lisa Appleton shocks onlookers as she steps out wearing butterfly NIPPLE TASSELS and cow slippers
thread.title_full: Lisa Appleton shocks onlookers as she steps out wearing butterfly NIPPLE TASSELS and cow slippers

author: Emmeline Saunders
title: Lisa Appleton shocks onlookers as she steps out wearing butterfly NIPPLE TASSELS and cow slippers
text:
Lisa Appleton shocks onlookers as she steps out wearing butterfly NIPPLE TASSELS and cow slippers The ex-Big Brother star made sure all eyes were on her for her big night out Share   Thank you for subscribing!   
An Appleton a day keeps the doctor away, as the old adage goes, so we can all thank Lisa Appleton for doing her bit for public health. 
Last night the former Big Brother star stumbled out of an Ann Summers party wearing barely anything, despite the chilly temperature and threats of snow. 
She covered her nipples with a pair of butterfly clips, pairing them with some black pyjama bottoms and - to top it off - a pair of fluffy cow slippers. Read More Lisa Appleton rides a broom in most ridiculous pics yet as she's spotted moving house Lisa's taking the pyjama day-wear trend a little too far (Photo: XPOSUREPHOTOS.COM) 
Despite running into a pap just outside her friend's house, Lisa made no effort to cover herself up and even laid on the wet ground at one point to pose some more. 
One of her butterflies had fallen off by the time she'd made it to a horizontal position, but that didn't seem to worry her too much. 
She clutched a bottle of wine to her body and danced around the garden in glee, sparing no thought for her slippers. Read More (Photo: XPOSUREPHOTOS.COM) One of her butterflies met a sad end (Photo: XPOSUREPHOTOS.COM) 
Lisa has promised to get herself back into shape after bewailing her figure on Twitter this week. 
"Feeling terrible about my weight gain size 14-16, few yrs bk I was size 10-12 just shows too much stress and stodgy food is no good," she tweeted. 
"Can not wait to get my 6 pack back, sexy gap between my thighs and stubborn fat gone as I'm fed up of feeling terrible sluggish!" 
She added in response to a MirrorCeleb tweet: "What ever it takes I will look like and be a Gladiator again 'watch this space'." 
Oh, but we will.
